companyHistory.title: Let us tell you the story about our company
companyHistory.info1: The Doctor Ali brand was founded in 1992 by the international company Mehrigiyo, and for 32 years has been producing organic products and promoting a healthy lifestyle.
companyHistory.info2: The company produces over 100 product varieties, and the plants and medicinal herbs used are grown on over 500 hectares under the supervision of qualified specialists.
companyHistory.info3: Our products, manufactured to international standards with certifications, have entered the markets of Uzbekistan, Kazakhstan, Kyrgyzstan, Tajikistan, Saudi Arabia, China and the USA.

world.title: Doctor Ali's products conquer the world market

workProcess.title: Get to know our working process

item1.title: We grow medicinal herbs ourselves
item1.content: We fully control the process with the help of our experienced specialists, ensuring the highest level of quality.

item2.title: We process the plants using modern methods
item2.content: We use advanced technologies to transform them into ready products.

item3.title: We package for your convenience
item3.content: We ensure all our products are packaged conveniently for your use.

item4.title: We deliver your order for free
item4.content: No matter where you live in Uzbekistan, we will deliver your order to your home.

product.title: Mahsulotimizning afzalliklarini kashf eting
product.card1: 32 yillik izlanishlar natijasida ishlab chiqilgan mahsulot
product.card4: O'zbekiston bo'ylab bepul etkazib berish xizmati

health.title: Salomatlik uchun no'yob kompleks
health.subtitle: 70 hil shifobahsh giyohdan tarkib topgan kompleksning o'ziga xos xususiyatlari

card1.title: Yurak-qontmir tizimi faoliyatini raqbatlantiradi
card1.subtitle: Kompleks tarkibidagi guava yurak faoliyatini qo'llab-quvvatlash, yurak urishi va qon bosimini normallashishga yordam beradi.

card2.title: Qandli diabet
card2.subtitle: Kompleks tarkibidagi mingbarg, papaya va chakanda osimligi qondagi qand miqdori va qon quyukligini me'yoriy holatda ushlab turish, sano esa qonni tozalashda ijobiy natija ko'rsatadi.

card3.title: Asabiylik va uyqusizlik
card3.subtitle: Kompleks tarkibidagi lavanda markaziy asab tizimiga tinchlantiruvchi ta'sir ko'rsatib, uyqu sifatini yaxshilashga yordam beradi.

card4.title: O'shqozon kasalliklari
card4.subtitle: Kompleks tarkibidagi limon o'ti, rozmarin, tol va chakanda o'shqozon va o'n ikki barmoqli ichak kasalliklarida ijobiy natija ko'rsatadi.

card5.title: Jinsiy kasalliklar
card5.subtitle: Kompleks tarkibidagi gingo biloba, er bodomi, tukli ervak, papaya kabi komponentlar erkaklar va ayollarda uchrashuvchi jinsiy kasalliklarning oldini olishtirishga ko'maklashadi.

card1.title: Qon bosimi
card1.subtitle: Qon bosimini normal holatda ushlab turish va yurak-qontmir tizimi faoliyatini raqbatlantirishga yordam beradi.

card2.title: Qandli diabet
card2.subtitle: Organizmdagi ortiqcha holesterin miqdorini kamaytiradi va tomirlar elastikligini oshiradi.

card3.title: Asabiylik
card3.subtitle: Markaziy asab tizimiga tinchlantiruvchi ta'sir ko'rsatadi va asab kasalliklarining oldini olishtirishga ko'maklashadi.

card4.title: Uyqusizlik
card4.subtitle: Uyqu sifatini oshiradi va buning hisobiga hotiraga ijobiy ta'sir ko'rsatadi.

card5.title: O'shqozon kasalliklari
card5.subtitle: O'shqozon-ichak trakti kasalliklari – gastrit, kolit va qabziyatda yordam beradi.

card6.title: Shamollash va yalliglanishlar
card6.subtitle: Prostata bezi, buyraklar va tananing boshqa a'zolari dagi yalliglanish jarayoniga qarshi kurashda ijobiy natija ko'rsatadi.

card7.title: Imunitet pastligi
card7.subtitle: Imunitetni mustahkamlash, organizmning kasalliklarga nisbatan kurashuvchanligini oshirishga ko'maklashadi.

card8.title: Jinsiy kasalliklar
card8.subtitle: Erkaklar va ayollardagi jinsiy kasalliklar, sidik yo'lida muammolarining oldini olishtirishda samarali vosita hisoblanadi.

label.recommend: Professor Zokirjon Muhammadjonov "Doctor Ali" kompleksini tavsiya qiladi

item1.question: How do I choose the right product for me?
item1.answer: Before recommending our products to customers, we thoroughly study their health issues and conduct consultations under a doctor's supervision. We determine the treatment course for clients individually based on their overall condition. The product price depends directly on this.

item2.question: Do you guarantee product quality?
item2.answer: Our products have international quality certificates and consist of natural herbs. During production, we pay special attention to each product. International certificates confirm the high quality of our products.

item3.question: Is the consultation paid?
item3.answer: Consultations and valuable recommendations from our specialists are absolutely free.

item4.question: Is there a delivery service?
item4.answer: After ordering the products, we deliver them for free to any city of Uzbekistan.

item5.question: How can I make a payment?
item5.answer: Once your order is delivered to the address you specified, you can pay for the products using a convenient method – through the Click or PayMe apps or in cash.

lead.title: Get a consultation
lead.info: Receive a free consultation about the product from our specialists and take the first step toward a healthy life!

item1.title: ISO
item1.info: Xalqaro standartlashgich tashkiloti (ISO) tomonidan ta'sis etilgan bo'lib, sifat darajasini ko'rsatib beruvchi dunyodagi eng mashhur sertifikat sanaladi.

item2.title: USDA Organic
item2.info: AQSh Qishloq xozirgiyoq departamenti tomonidan taqdim etiladigan mazkur sertifikat organik mahsulotlarining sifat standartlariga muvofiqlik darajasini belgilab beradi.

item3.title: HALAL
item3.info: Ushbu xalqaro hujjat mahsulot tarkibidagi komponentlar, shuningdek uning ishlab chiqarish jarayonining Islom dini va sharoit ahkomiiga muvofiq ekanligini tasdiqlaydi.

item4.title: EU Organic
item4.info: Mazkur sertifikat mahsulotning Evropa bio standartlariga muvofiq ekanligini bildiradi. Bio va organik mahsulotlarining dunyo miqyosida tan olgan umumiy belgisi hisoblanadi.
